I play daily I am addicted started playing months ago and Was blown away by how üëågreat & EXTREMELY DETAILED STORY CHOICE BASED OPTIONS ARE SO IN DEPTH! üíØ Its been over a month of reg daily play & still being surprised! There's so much effort in creating this im shocked its free!!! TY AGAIN, HOPE U CAN CONTINUE UPDATING. üí°(ADDING [SKIP] OPTION 4 ENEMY TURNS WUD B GREAT) üíØBüëçRüëèAüôèVüëåOüíØ
Nice game and story.. no part 2 of this game

Detailed world with a great eastern european atmosphere. Im pleased to see charisma stat, or personality in this case, actually matters. Crafting makes sense and resources are scarce enough to keep it interesting. Enemies are tough, ammo is always low. This game is a thrill to play, even on my MaraX mobile. Great job!
Awesome experience for the previously made for pc game. This being available on mobile makes it a greater experience

Just what I have been looking for. I am sceptic gamer. I read and re-read reviews before getring this one. And I am graciously pleased. It's the fine details that get me, the care given to make this. I give the devs 2 thumbs (and 2 big toes) up.
Nice game like Fallout 1/2....
Never played something as good as this on Android

Tiny font even on a 10,8 inch screen. Cannot see what my character's stats are without a magnifying class, and character build is one of the most important things in this game to get right. Not refunding, but if this isn't going to be fixed, I will request, as it's completely unplayable this way for me. The PC version's font is perfectly readable on an 14,4 inch screen, for comparison.
replyContent: Hello. There are two types of screen resolution in the game - for a smartphone and for a tablet. Probably there was a bug in your case. Moreover, your device was not detected by the playmarket. Please write to our support@atomrpg.com and we will help you + try to fix the problem in the next patch.

content: 200 hours I've put into this game and honestly I didn't want to stop please give me more I'm begging you \\\\ what's the time Frame looking like üòÜüòÜüòÜüòÜ I just need a lil info help relieve my nerves......... Please üôèüôèüôèüôè
replyContent: Hey! We are in progress :)

content: Very good game tack a wayal to learn Nice graphics top job üëç

Ok so i bought this game on a whim not expecting anything i was looking for good fallout like rpg on the phone. And i found it, dialogue and the world are emersive the combat while a bit rng is very responsive and feels good, aside from that i only found two minor hiccups, the movement and camera being clunky and my frames tanking while having the search function activitie while in settlements with alota items. Otherwise i recommend the game alot!
I made a pretty expensive mistake. Not very well optimised for mobile.
replyContent: Hello. Our game is very well optimized and your phone is defined as a high end device so there should be no performance problems. We recommend you lock framerate on 30FPS and change the graphics settings if necessary. If you want to make a return of your purchase - write to our support@atomrpg.com

content: This game is amazing, cionsidering it's a mobile game! I have no doubt that this is the best game on google playstore! I also purchased the DLC and really enjoy the HD gallery included! Although this game is perfect, I'd really like to see a radio that can be played in the background, that would be amazing. Somehing along the lines of Fallout 3 / Fallout New Vegas radio.

Absolutely excellent. As the initial game of an indie studio, I can't recommend this game enough. No pay-to-win, and I wqs happy to spend a tiny bit more for a sneak outfit and knife thay I stilll use, 30 hours in. I'm ready for the sequel!
Awesome! There are some things to improve in control, but generally its the best rpg on android. Who knows fallout will agree

Totatly stunning, its satisfing as what I dreamed fallout3 could have been. Pc version is the one but im certanly good with portable. My PROBLEM is hot hot phones. Sony z3 2014 can play this but not well touch is buggy so I would like controler support. Otherwise my sony XZ2 this game is AWSOME n works great but eats battery and heats up more than running Dolphin so. Im not asking for any fixes as of yet Just info for people, anyway thanks for what you guys do.
replyContent: Hello. Thank you for the nice words, we are glad that you like the game. In case of extreme heat, we recommend lowering the graphics settings and removing the phone from the case.

content: Pretty sure interface issue is still a thing.
replyContent: Hello. We added the ability to customize the interface and worked on its usability. What problem are you talking about?

content: Fighting controls are awful
replyContent: Hello. We plan to continue improving the interface, especially its combat part. Hopefully, over time you will appreciate our work.

content: I want to ask, is there any plan to bring trudograd on mobile? Keep up the good work, we are waiting.
replyContent: Hello! Of course but first we need to release Trudograd on PC.

content: About an hour in pretty good but I just wish there was voice acting I would've payed more.
replyContent: Hello. Unfortunately, dialogue voice acting is an extremely expensive thing, too much for our small studio. So we had to do without her. Hope for understanding.

content: Great game but just realised this is steam ported game to mobile.. Still awesome tho coz not so many game ported to mobile & I can play anywhere lol.. Btw is there a way to play with mod?
Excellent! Just that 90's style rpg that I love!
For some reason my review was deleted. I am enjoying the game very much and expect good quality rpg's from you guys in the future.
replyContent: Hello. Developers cannot remove reviews of games. However, we are grateful for your kind words. Thank you!

Great game with intersting story, cool quests and characters. In classic fallout style with better grafics. Respect to developers. Waiting for continue...

content: Perfect replication of the first fallout with a different story. Would recomend buying the game and the .99 dlc.
This game is worth to buy and play..seem very realistic just like pc version of fallout.trust me.this game is very fun to play to those who like survival story .this is the choice..
Awesome game favorite game on my phone right now

content: Great RPG, similar to old fallouts. Many solutions are not obvious at first, and the game rewards creative experimentation. Port runs a little clunky on mobile, and interaction is more tedious than with a mouse, but it's a full scale unity rpg from pc with no corners cut for phones. Runs tolerably on low settings with even budget hardware, quite an accomplishment. Edit: recent update killed performance on my phone.
replyContent: Hello! What about performance after the update? Can you write to our support@atomrpg.com? We will definitely help you.

content: So complicated I wouldn't waste your time. Ok if it was a pc but to wade through this on a phone is crazy. Zero development put in for phone use.
replyContent: Hello. We are constantly improving the game and improving it in every possible way. In the last patch, we added the ability to customize the controls and this greatly simplifies the gameplay. Besides, you can always lower the difficulty level of the game :)

content: One of my favorite game on phone
Love it! Fallout 1 and 2's russian successor

DO NOT BUY THIS GAME. Game controls are unresponsive and awful. Trouble even scrolling up and down just in settings. Game does not register camera movement or zooming in and out until numerous attempts. My phone has NO trouble running dead cells, stardew valley, minecraft pe so this game has serious control problems due to bad programming/bad pc port. I would love a refund as the game is unplayable. Can't even hardly get thru the beginning! Who came up with drag item to equip? Try a equip button
replyContent: Hello. Huge number of players have no control problems and enjoy history and gaming experience of ATOM. Moreover, we are listening to our players and have added extensive customization of controls in latest update and it works well. So if you need, we are always ready to help the players, for this you just need to write to our support@atomrpg.com

content: Games is fun but I wish it had controller support
replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your opinion. We are currently working on support for controllers, but at the moment the first stage is implemented and the game already supports the mouse.

content: Put that hand on me again and you won't get it back. I'm playing survival difficulty. It takes me hours and hours of game play then one day when I try to continue loading loading I see my game was automatically deleted. Five Stars with Happy Face to One Star with Sad Faces. One star to 3 star because they try to help me.
replyContent: Hello, can you please describe how this save deletion happened by writing us a line to support@atomrpg.com ? We're looking to fix this problem ASAP.

content: Would recommend. One of the best post apocalyptic game. If you enjoyed fallout 1 and 2 this is the game to your liking. But I have a problem with the ending. After the credit if I click continue the game will just load a previous safe before the end mission. That means I have to do it again. I tried it 3 times and the same result. It's kinda sad you can't see what happens to Karsnoznamenny or the red fighter as the narrator describes. Idk if it's intentional or glitch. Overall nice game.
I am really really excited to play this. I need a good survival fallout inspired rpg for my phone. I look forward to coming back to five star this after I play!
Fun game but buggy.
replyContent:
Greetings!
Can you please elaborate on which bugs you found? We're actively working on supporting the game all the time and if you send us a bug description to support@atomrpg.com we'll fix it ASAP!
Thank you!
Atom Team

content: Hi, so I'm a Huge fan of the game, really loving it and spending hours playing it, but I believe the game is not yet ready to be called fully obimized for mobile devices, as I'm still seeing descreptions belong to pcs and stuff, anyways I bought this nz-75 helmet but I'm stuck, It seems that there is noway to turn it on as it requires you to " press use " to turn it on, and of caurse there is no use button to be pressed as I'm playing on a mobile ! So pls fix this ASAP guys

Awesome survival RPG, with Fallout 2 notes that will make any nostalgic sigh happily. The Android port is not greatly optimized and it may be a bit slow on mid-range phones. The inventory menu needs a bit of tweaking because when switching between tabs it seems to forget some items that you have, only to remember them again when closing and opening the inventory again. Over all, great game. I haven't played the PC version.

Game is great only watched Fallout vids and it does come close, might even be better. Looking forward for the mobile version of Trudograd expansion and will there be an option to transfer character save file?

content: Unbelievably good game, though I'll admit it took a bit for me to adjust to the pace of it somewhat. It's a fairly slow paced game, and that's perfectly fine, just not something I've encountered in a while. Having tons of fun playing it and would recommend it to any fans of rpgs

This is a great game definitely worth the money love the classic fallout and wasteland vibe I see they made a part 2 to this game hopefully it comes out for mobile too I'd love to I continue on the story I highly recommed anyone thinking of buying this to do it

There are plenty of things that could be improved, but overall, I think this game is well made. In regards to controls, it isn't self-explanatory how to do certain actions, such as unlocking, precise movement etc. It's also not clear that you can scroll down in the settings. Still, I recommend this game, it's fun!
Best RPG on phone yet.
Pretty good, ive been waiting a long while for this. But, itd be awesome to get full support of s-pen. Im on a note 10. Update: Has been fixed fully, with even better GUI. Thanks for the support.

content: Good game. But problem. In the area "Red fighter" I can't remove barricades, to get to character Geksogen. Can interact with barricades is it bug or I do something wrong?

WOW My new favourite game I started playing and can't stop great game reminds me of fallout 1,2 and tactics. Thank you for a brilliant throw back to the original fallout 1,2. Keep it up look forward to seeing new quests, game improvements and more.
No wonder everyone is afraid of Russians. Best Fallout 2.5 on Android (usually I don't give a toss about rates&reviews but this one feels like personal)
Love it keep up the good work

Absolutely wonderful game play just make sure you save before important dialogue !! Making this game was a great idea ! And playing it was even better ! Can't put it down no matter how hard I try !! The dlc is worth buying and supporting the creators! Plus the gillly suit is just awesome !! Thanks for an amazing game !!

Definitely a breath of fresh air away from the mainstream games. It brings back the old school rpg style and honestly does it so well. Yea there are some bugs but nothing that cant be taken care of. I believe this game and its sequel have a lot of potential. I do hope this game gets more updates since turograd isnt on mobile yet. I just beat my first playthrough and was extremely impressed with the story telling and i enjoy all the text to read. Keep up the good work guys!!
amazing pc game in mobile format will give 5 Stars for keyboard and mouse, controller support for those with higher end devices that support a desktop mode

content: I'm updating my review as I think the game deserves it. The camera controls now are excellent and make the game so much better, it runs great on my galaxy 9+. Still think it needs exit markers on the area you are in and it really could do with some kind of map marker system for say shops etc, I can't remember where they are all the time. But great game regardless, 26 hours play time so far üôÇ
replyContent: Hello! We changed the camera control mechanics and added halloween event on the first Global map :) Please update the game and try that :)

content: It's a fun game but when I got to the place where you buy a pass to enter. It froze and all I could do is read what the people are saying. When I got pass the first area it kept giving the"you can't do this action when your backpack is overloaded"message, constantly. Back to back to back,over and over. My backpack is halfway filled. It might be me but I don't see a waypoint and it makes it hard to see where I got to go. Please give me pointers or please refund.
replyContent:
Hello!
We had a bug related to the message about the overload of the backpack. Please update the game, because you are currently using NOT the actual version, which means we cannot be sure that the game will work fine. 
If the problem persists after the update - write to us at support@atomrpg.com.

content: Irritating lack of loot/items from most things you kill and the objects you search. It badly needs mod support since base game sucks without them

Game is pretty neat, price is not overwhelming for the game it is. I do have an issue though - in caves and mines the game goes down to like 2-3fps, even lowering the settings to "fastest". I'm fairly certain my phone is not the issue, it runs fine outside on maximum graphics. Maybe you need to optimize underground for mobile? Idk what exactly happens but it seems like a memory problem.
replyContent: Hello. We are constantly working on optimizations, and we hope that in the next patch it will be much better. Thank you for your feedback!

content: Atom RPG looked promising, especially during the first couple of hours. It captures the spirit and vide from the original Fallout games. As the story progresses, it gets more and more convoluted and it becomes a bit of a mess. Locations feel mostly empty, with some exceptions. Sadly, it feel like the team really wanted to make a Fallout-like without considering the strength of original games: the story. In A-rpg, there is hardly one, it is just a nice nuclear sandbox.
replyContent:
Hello. Our game has a huge number of unique characters with personal stories. Perhaps, somewhere we lacked experience, but this is the first game for an amateur studio, so this is an indie RPG. We will try to improve our game, so thank you for your feedback. 
We hope you enjoy ATOM RPG further.

content: Give it a try

This game is... heavily inspired, obviously, by Fallout-1-2, and it seems to borrow both good and not-so-good for a game of 2020. Combat and health system is the same primitive one. Dialogue system tries to be more complex, though I can't say it adds much fun. Crafting added, but it looks rather redundant. And the overall mood of the game... too serious? Thus mixed feelings. On the good side: the game is quite playable on the phone, and it's perfectly stable! A really good job by the devs.

Very nice game. However received a strange message from Android system telling me temperature from my phone was too high and asking me to reduce brightness (which wasn't at the max at all) and system had to shut down some process. Was just playing the game without charging my phone and with no app in the background. I have a OnePlus 8pro 12 gigas... Very strange isn't it?! A feedback would be much appreciated
replyContent: Yes! It is very strange. I saw your post from XDA and we will try to reproduce it. Can you provide more details of the phone case, maybe photo or model. support@atomrpg.com

content: Great game could use some tweaking but hands down one of the best post nuclear apocalypse games I've played on mobile.

A very addicting game... Have immersed lots of hours into this game... Probably the best offline RPG in the market... There are some bugs though, like when you can't tap the tiles accurately in death tunnel (probably caused by the toxic gas but idk) and you rarely get stuck on walking animation when entering combat mode right after entering a map cell... I also suggest adding more weapons, especially Russian-made ones (SVU, PPSh-41, RPG)...
replyContent: Hello. Please update the game. All these things was fixed :)

content: Cucumber Brine doesn't remove alcoholism like it's supposed to
Good. Fun. Wish it had a better quest tracking system but I'm sure that's on the way.

Game is awesome for Die hards of the traditional old school RPG concepts, though a bit wordy, and you may not get rewarded for all the talking you do, and FYI Melee Builds are tough to progress but fun when you KO an enemy up close. Would like more alternative items to the crafting system materials. But I'm only 30 hrs in and I do try to take my time and look under every rock so..if that give you an idea. Bug: skills or stats that have modifiers are flickering back and forth
Awesome work....wish you had an American map. Something to thing about....
Loved it, wish it was longer, make an expansion guys i need more
Great rpg experience, especially for mobile. But it's a bit hard (even on easy)
replyContent: Hello! So why only 3 stars? :(

content: Great tactical/survival RPG.

content: One of the best RPG experience available on playstore, the lore is kind of awesome but the bunkers could have been more scary, the partner system is cool, love papa Hexogen and his SKS, great jobs Dev's on this title, waiting for Trudograd, please make it available as soon as it's finished, can't wait!!!!

content: Edit: I appreciate the reply thank you, I completely agree you should not make the game world sterile, and the setting would have such things, I just thought a way to stop it like baldurs gate 2 has would ease the feeling and also add more immersion to a well made world already. I'd even be willing to pay the a few pounds on a 'dog saviour dlc' and donate some to an animal charity, just a suggestion though, again thanks for the respectful reply I will make review 4 due to your explanation üëç
replyContent:
Hello. ATOM RPG has a ruthless post-apocalyptic world, in which there are many horrors that have no place in the real world.
We love dogs as much as you do, but we will not make the game world sterile. It is cruel and merciless place. But out of respect for you, we will think about how to make this moment better. :)

The ultimate old-school Fallout experience in post-nuclear USSR setting. The game is long, story-rich, your choices matter. The mobile port works extremely well, I actually enjoy playing this game on mobile even more than playing on PC (I own a PC version as well). Cloud saving feature helps a lot. There are some minor bugs (sometimes in-game interface buttons don't react, and cloud sync is a tad slow), but they don't ruin the experience. Can't wait for the Trudograd add-on here!

Well all in all its a great game to bad that its not for consoles to oh well but the android version its pretty good I just whis one thing from this game I meant 2 things one better camera mobility and joysticks compatibylit it's very hard to play it after a couple of hours so please devs make it happen thank you for this game üòÅüòçüëåüòä ok devs I'm really glad that you answer but there's a bug in my game I've sold a lot of stuff but I don't have any money huawei 10 Pro please devs fix this bug
replyContent: Update: We upload the new patch with new camera joystick and new movement mechanics, please update the game. Thank you.

content: Really great game, true RPG experience! Theres so much content in my first 30 hours of playing and i think its well worth the money I paid for.
I paid for this app but I have not received any of the items that is supposed to come with the paid edition.
replyContent:
Hello! You can find all DLC items on Crash Site location. And thank you for support!
Upd: We are added Halloween event on first Global map, just update your game and try it :)

content: Almost Fallout, almost Wastelands...
Got to wounded tourist tunnel now I can't shoot or move in battle

I really love the game. I own the game on pc via Steam also. I've got an online account with Atom, but can't seem to get Keyboard to come up so I can type in the email user and password. Great game but need an isometric mode because the camera controls are so wonky
replyContent: Hello! In last patch we reworked the camera control mechanics and also added Halloween event. Please update the game and try that :)

content: Game feels great, but I am a little frustrated all dialog text skips on its own so I hardly know what I'm agreeing to. Wish there was a way to control that. Overall feels pretty solid.
replyContent: Hello. That's seems like a bug. Can you write to our support@atomrpg.com?

content: Great!
My car stuck in a lake near Fogelevka and I couldn't go anywhere. Fix the bug guys!!
replyContent: Hello! We fix that bug and also we reworked the camera control mechanics. Please update game and try again :)

content: Great game. Especially if you like the old school fallout games. Bit of a pain to control camera sometimes but great none the less.
Utterly lost for words Besides some interface clarity issues and a steep learning curve it's perfect.
I played on PC and it was ok. I have a pretty beefy tablet with 4gb ram and it won't run this game very well. Bummer. It runs most other premium games on max, so not sure why so laggy.
replyContent: Hello! What graphic settings do you use? You can lower graphic settings and also lock FPS on value 30. Also you can write to our support@atompg.com and we will try to help you.

content: Spiritual successor to the original isometric Fallout games, ported beautifully to mobile!
Great game to kill time.
Downloaded it so I wouldn't forget to do it tomorrow. I haven't played it yet but I know it's gonna be awesome! If your reading this review, this game is awesome!
replyContent: No, you're awesome! Thank you for support :)

content: This game is really really good and with a few more tweaks could be one of the best ever. Load times can be a little annoying at times and more control of your party members would be nice. There's also a bug I'm experiencing in Krasnoznamenny in the building with the police chief. When i enter the building i get teleported inside the furnace thing and get stuck. I have to reload from an earlier save to keep playing. Other than that, i can't stop playing it.
replyContent: Hello! We fix that bug just update your game and try again :)

content: Very good , game a few bugs here and thier but nothing too major, it's like fallout in your pocket!!
Very good game and the Dev team was always helpful with any questions that I had and they got back to me within a few hours the overall experience was great. I can't wait for the next game!

A brilliant homage to CRPGs of old, and a fantastic game in it's own right. One of the very few rare gems on the playstore, and at a very fair price, to boot: Once I picked this up I literally could not put it down. I commend the devs in making what is very clearly a passion project, and a fantastic experience. A must-play for fans of the genre, and a worthy entry game for curious newcomers.
Bought the dlc but didn't receive a knife of camo or nothing
replyContent: Hello! You need to find crashsite location. This location is available after purchasing DLC and contains all items you need!

content: Awesome look forward to seeing more updates and improvements
I didnt save my game to cloud and now all of my things are gone to where i have to start all over
replyContent: Hello. What exactly happened to you? Can we help you?

content: Few forgivable bugs here and there but EXCELLENT GAME overall! It's a very worthwhile premium game both as a whole and it's supporter content (The stealth suit is very useful.) 10/10. A very sweet love letter for the fallout 1&2 fans out there. Devs are also very professional and responsive but also has a heart and love for their fans and their work. Hoping for the continuous sucess of this game and the team and ofcourse looking forward for the ATOM TRUDOGRAD here at the playstore soon. ;)
replyContent: Hello! Thanks for your feedback! We also want Trudograd in the play market and will work on it! :)

content: Not the best experience. I was having fun until a rat pinned me down and killed me 2 or 3 times. I finally got past the rat. I got a toy gun, went "PEW" (literally) and the whole village, including the pigs and other animals rallied together to kill me. What the hell is going on to make anyone think either of these 2 instances make any logical sense as a mechanic? So, I didnt get far because the fun was quickly killed..like I was with the Rat from hell.
replyContent: Hello! This rat has its own name Mouserinks and is a miniboss. The battle with that creature is very difficult and if you could not cope with it right away, get more experience and come back later!

content: This Is Very Good Start.

Hello!
We are already working on an update to improve optimization. We hope it will be in the next patch! Thank you for support!

content: This game is awesome. Going to be the best game on android for me. Only problem for me is sometimes I have no idea where to go. The people add an x to my map but I can't see it

This game has wonderful potential, although I've had poor luck with it. This is the second time that my character has locked up in combat. I can't move, shoot or anything else in combat. I've entered into multiple combats, reloaded and nothing works. I can't invest anymore hours into leveling up a character only to have to restart. Please, fix your game. I am otherwise enjoying it tremendously.
replyContent: Hello! We fix all type of thats problem in actual patch. Please update the game and try again :)

content: I have a Galaxy tab S2 and the game does run but only at the lowest graphic setting. It's nice to have that option but it's a big compromise. I gambled when I purchased this game not knowing if it would work, I feel you should include some recommended hardware configuration in your description. Great game!

ATOM is a fully developed CRPG for fans of traditional turn-based tactics games. The writing is what really shines. Each NPC has an exciting tree of dialogue and its tone is surprisingly modern. Topics of conversation can be dark, gritty, and sorrowful, but suddenly switch to playful without a sharp loss to cohesion. For the price of admission, players get a full PC port with 50-60 hours of isometric CRPG greatness. Combat is fun, survival, crafting, cooking, hunting, etc. It's all here!

Atom created a splash when it came out by it's faithful recreation of the fallout 1/2 experience. I'd call it more true to the fallout/canticle for liebowitz-ish vision than 3/4/NV, though those are great games. This seems like a great port, so come wander the Soviet wasteland. Dasvidanya!
Too awesome

Game is good but lacking content and seems rushed. Dont know if it will be updated, bought DLC but I didn't receive the knife or ghillie suit like the DLC said included. Dont know what happened there, because I got the wallpapers and songs, but nothing else?
replyContent: Hello! You can find Crash Site location on Global map. That location contains all additional items. And thank you for support!

content: If you loved baldurs gate then you'll probably like this as well.

Good port of a good Fallout 2 style PC game, no in game purchases or begging for money. It runs smoothly on my Samsung Galaxy S8. The only not so nice thing - it drains my battery to zero in about 2.5 hours, but a power bank can help with this issue. Definitely worth buying if you are a fan of good old Fallout 1-2.
so far so good , I will try another path this time , not the same as my character on pc

If you miss old-time CRPGs (Fallout, Arcanum, you name it) - complex plots, lots of possibilities, real challenge, grim humour, easter eggs, ATOM RPG is your choice. This time with Soviet flavour. Play on PC, continue on phone.

While ultimately I did end up refunding the game, my phone was overheating. It is a very well done port and a much needed change to the standard shovelware on the play store. This is a solid 4/5, would be 5/5 with a little more optimization or possibly tablet only.
replyContent: Thank you very much for addressing the issue! We are looking into the issue and it should be fixed in a few patches for most devices. Were you by any chance using a case on your phone while playing?

content: I have played many hours on PC and I can finally say we got a real Fallout game for mobile now. Hope the devs will improve on this one like they did with the PC version.
